content: 上传github报错 ssh: Could not resolve hostname github.com:HimawariSunFlower: nodename nor servname provided, or not known fatal: Could not read from remote repository. Please make sure you have the correct access rights and the repository exists 首先怀疑是公司gitlab账户覆盖掉github账户 ssh-add -l 确实没发现github的密钥 ssh -T git@github.com是通的，ping不通 尝试方法1 hosts修改去可以ping通，没有用 尝试方法2 添加多个账户，添加到ssh-add，没有用，方法2延伸问题，ssh passphrase忘记，mac钥匙串可以找回 最终解决方法 dns冲洗 #Other ways to flush your dns, in windows in your terminal ipconfig /flushdns #on macos dscacheutil -flushcache #on linux service nscd restart
title: 上传github,ssh报错及解决方法
